question: Mashallah, I have been blessed with 2 wonderful daughters, and I love them dearly
answer:
QUESTION

As-Salaam Alaikum Respected Mufti Sahib,

Mashallah, I have been blessed with 2 wonderful daughters, and I love them dearly. My husband and I would try to have a baby boy.  Is there any dua that we can recite so that Allah SWT can bless us with a son?  Your assistance would be truly appreciated.

ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

It was also the wish and desire of the parents of Mariam (AS) to have a son. Allah instead blessed them with Mariam (AS). One of the most revered women in Islam. It is upto Allah to grant a son or a daughter. Continue making Dua and Allah will grant you whatever is best for you.  

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
